statement: During FY‑2026, the Arkansas Department of Health (ADH) issued appropriation and program announcements for operations and the trauma system, but there were no compliance determinations or enforcement actions.  Searches of the department’s website and news releases did not reveal any such actions.
statutory_basis:
The ADH appropriation act details operations and trauma system funding for FY‑2026 and does not include compliance
determinations【209394869917142†L720-L780】【209394869917142†L785-L829】.
